summary: Convert the app into a fully installable Progressive Web App (PWA) for QuickBazar with manifest, icons, service worker, offline caching, install prompt support, and compliance with Chrome PWA install criteria.
architectural_notes: Add Web App Manifest for PWA: name/short_name QuickBazar, start_url '/', display 'standalone', theme_color '#FF6A00', background_color '#ffffff'.
Add PWA icons (192x192, 512x512, and maskable) and reference them from the manifest.
Register a service worker and implement offline caching for the home and main pages.
Support install prompt flow and meet Chrome PWA installability criteria so Chrome mobile shows 'Install app'.

new_feature_requests.summary: Make QuickBazar a fully installable PWA (manifest, icons incl. maskable, service worker + offline caching for home/main pages, install prompt support, meet Chrome install criteria)
